XIGMATEK Galaxy III Essential 120mm RGB Case Fan (3 Pack)

The XIGMATEK Galaxy III Essential 120mm RGB Case Fan (3 Pack) comes with the addressable RGB fans. XIGMATEK Galaxy III Essential has a 120mm fan frame with addressable RGB LEDs and can offer a rainbow effect on its own or work in combination with M/B to create a full PC case with an impeccable lighting effect. capable of supporting the most popular ARGB motherboard on the market. Xigmatek hydro bearing fans provide long life, high performance, and low noise. The Galaxy III is an intelligent RGB system with MB sync and full control.

Higher Speed Range Up To 800 to 1800 RPM

The Galaxy III Essential ARGB casing fan features a unique blade arrangement that maximizes airflow while minimizing noise. The fans' speeds range from 800 to 1800 RPM, and you may adjust them using PWM control to achieve the desired cooling performance. They also have rubber shock-absorbing pads that reduce noise and vibration. These fans are designed to fit the majority of PC cases due to their compatibility with 120mm fan mounts.

Up To 40,000 Hours Lifespan

The Galaxy III Essential ARGB Case Cooling Fan is built to last with superior components and superb craftsmanship. They are a trustworthy solution for long-term use due to their 40,000-hour lifespan.Finally, the Xigmatek Galaxy III Essential ARGB 120mm (3 Pack) White Casing Cooling Fan is an excellent choice for anyone looking to boost their PC's cooling performance while introducing some creative flair. Because of its advanced features and ease of installation, this fan set will please any builder looking for high-quality components.

full_description:
Xigmatek Starlink Ultra 3 In 1 ARGB Casing Fan

The Xigmatek Starlink Ultra 3 In 1 ARGB Casing Fan provides the best performance for cooling. These fans have dimensions of 120(L) x 120(W) x 25(H) mm and are equipped with a dependable Hydraulic Bearing for smooth and quiet operation. The Addressable RGB LED color provides a dynamic and personalized visual element, and the LED position is compatible with the M/B SYNC Hub for synchronized lighting effects. The fan operates between DC 8.0V and 13.8V and requires 12V 0.16A 1.92W for the fan and 5V 0.864A 4.32W for the LED. The Xigmatek Starlink Ultra case fan performs admirably with a noise level of less than 29.2dBA. It features an excellent airflow of 68.5 CFM and an air pressure of 2.05 mmH20, which all contribute to efficient cooling. The Xigmatek Starlink Ultra fans are a fantastic option for PC builders with a effective cooling and attractive RGB lighting effects.
